main.name: Fardin Safikhani
main.description: I am a software developer and I use javascript/react to develop pages, as well as Unity and C# to create Games. This website will be a place to host my future projects and hopefully catch the eyes of employers.
main.bio: I am a proud worker and i enjoy working on projects that have passion in them. During my time at school ive learned alot about data structures and the tools to make applications, but during my time at school I always made sure to keep my skills topped off by working on personal projects. Some of the skills ive prided myself on are: Javascript, Python, C#, and Java, I have used these languages consistently thorugh the years and Im sure given enough time i can learn even more about them.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to drop your email and get in touch ill get to you ASAP
